name: Dueling Solitaire
description:
Competitive variation on solitaire in which you can play on each other's ace piles.

Recommended in fullscreen mode.

  • Card images from Aisleriot
  • Icons from https://material.io/resources/icons/
  • Sound effect from https://freesound.org/people/qubodup/sounds/60013/
  • Cover image based on https://www.flickr.com/photos/22466614@N06/7618508482/
